inclusion.label: unknown
met

inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

notes: 47-year-old Asian woman with persistent feelings of sadness, loss of interest in activities, and weight loss. She has a history of digestive issues and her husband was recently diagnosed with colon cancer.
